synopsis.text:
Snake in the Grass: The Nohara family's fortuitous vacation to the exotic Buri Buri kingdom takes a sinister turn when the White Snake organization sets their sights on young Shinnosuke. Mistaken for the prince of the kingdom, who is the spitting image of Shinnosuke, the group believes that he holds the key to a hidden treasure buried deep within the golden palace.

With the help of his parents, Hiroshi and Misae, and the fierce palace guard Lulu, Shinnosuke must navigate the dangerous waters of this action-packed adventure to thwart the evil plans of the White Snake and restore peace to the Buri Buri kingdom. Will Shinnosuke be able to outsmart the cunning criminals and protect the hidden treasure, or will the White Snake slither away with the prize? Join Shinnosuke on this thrilling journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
